title: Guitar legends: the ultimate anthology
brief_description: This disc contains twelve songs from an array of British rock groups, presenting the influence of guitar, and guitarists on popular music, through an array of live performances. The tracks are: Paul Kosso/Free “Alright now”; Andy Powell/Wishbone Ash “Phoenix”; Robin Trower “Night of the guitars”; Ritchie Blackmore/Deep Purple “Improvisation”; Rory Gallagher “Could have had religion”; John Etheridge/Soft Machine “Tale of Taliesin ; Jan Akermann/Focus “Hocus pocus”; Vernon Reed/Jack Bruce “Sunshine of your love”; Steve Hackett “Clocks” ; Steve Howe “Clap”; Mick Box/Uriah Heep “The Magician’s birthday”; Tony Iommi/Black Sabbath “Headless cross”.
